name: Open the Moon Gate
description:
Story:

The Moon Gate has been destroyed, and you must restore it before toxins destroy the world.

Controls:

A/D - Rotate
L Mouse - Shoot
R Mouse - Hook
B - Crystal Blast
Spacebar - Create Moon
Esc - Exit Game

Strategy:

- Defend yourself from toxins by shooting them with the planet gun.
- Use the hook to capture purple crystals
- When you have three (3) crystals, press "Spacebar" to create a moon.
- When you have four (4) moons, the Moon Gate will open.
- Collect Moon Cores to stabilize the gate and win the game!
- If you become overwhelmed, fire a Crystal Blast by pressing 'B' when you have at least two (2) purple crystals.

This game was created for Ludum Dare 40 (12/3/17)
